meanings.sent1: The renouncers of unhealthy habits inspire others to make positive changes.

meanings.definition: Those who give up or refuse something.
meanings.sent1: The renouncers of fast food opt for homemade meals instead.
meanings.sent2: The renouncers of social media find more time for meaningful activities.
meanings.sent3: The renouncers of the challenge missed out on the opportunity to grow.
meanings.sent4: The renouncers of shortcuts understand the value of hard work.
meanings.sent5: The renouncers of excuses always find a way to overcome obstacles.

meanings.definition: To formally declare one's abandonment of something.
meanings.sent1: She renouncers her title as queen to live a simple life.
meanings.sent2: He renouncers his inheritance to pursue his passion for art.
meanings.sent3: The actor renouncers his role in the movie at the last minute.
meanings.sent4: The politician renouncers his ties to the corrupt organization.
meanings.sent5: The athlete renouncers his sponsorship deal to maintain his integrity.
